pr_title: [CALCITE-4239] RelMdUniqueKeys returns wrong unique keys for Aggregate with grouping sets

timeline.message: [CALCITE-4239] RelMdUniqueKeys returns wrong unique keys for Aggregate with grouping sets

timeline.bodyText: should we return false or null?
timeline.author: liyafan82

replies.bodyText: Return null seems better(it means unknown). Thank you for your review.
replies.author: chunweilei

timeline.bodyText: Since the group set is immutable, we can directly return rel.getGroupSet()?
timeline.author: liyafan82

replies.bodyText: I don't think so. rel.getGroupSet() returns ImmutableBitSet while here we should return Set<ImmutableBitSet>
replies.author: chunweilei

replies.bodyText: I see. Thanks for the clarification.
replies.author: liyafan82

timeline.message: [CALCITE-4239] RelMdUniqueKeys returns wrong unique keys for Aggregate with grouping sets
